alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 9:58AM PST until February 22 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in the valleys and 3 to 6 inches in the mountains. * WHERE...Northern Elko County, Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range, Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
